sets.description: Increases all attack types by **20%**/**24%**/**28%**/**32%**. Shadow inherits an additional **30%** of the wanderer's ATK. The first time you deal damage in combat, **1,000** weapon charge is granted. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.

After equipping **Purple Bamboo**, increase crit damage by **22%** and final damage by **28%**/**32%**/**36%**/**42%**. This set effect works in the off-hand slot, only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.
